#summary This helps you configure TheLastRipper under Linux

= Logging in =

http://thelastripper.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Website/HelpLinux/SettingsLogin.png

The first box that will be shown, is the box above. It shows the login menu, before you get started you need to have a Last.fm account, which is available at https://www.last.fm/join/. If you already have an account you are ready to proceed.
